original_text: Because I was sure of this, I wanted to come to you first, so that you might have a second experience of grace.
korean_text: 내가 이 확신을 가지고 너희로 두 번 은혜를 얻게 하기 위하여 먼저 너희에게 이르렀다가

sentences.original_text: Because I was sure of this
I wanted to come to you first
so that you might have a second experience of grace
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 은혜를 두 번째로 체험하게 하려 함이라
